info.name: Gaming On Linux Is Nice
info.description:
More than a dark theme.

IMPORTANT: Uncomment the first @import rules (erase /* and */ from lines 3&4) OR manually install Font Awesome to your system. Otherwise the icons won't display correctly.
info.additionalInfo:
v 0.6
 - Fixed a problem with the comment subscribe button showing misaligned.
 - Fixed share buttons being mixed.
v 0.5
 - Added icon for block user in article's comments.
 - Fixed a problem causing the announcements at the top stacking.
v 0.4
 - Added icon for edit comments.
v 0.3
 - Added for bookmark button
 - Update for comments subscribe button
 - Update for report spelling button
v.0.2
 - Better styling for announcements.
 - Better styling for pagination.
v.0.1
 - Release

data.title: works awesome but not my sense of style
